segments.text: I have found it quite different here from China since I came to the United States .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Some friends of mine took me to the mall to go shopping . It was so big . I think I could get lost if I went there alone .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You must have bought many things in the mall ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not really many . I was told that on weekends there were always the flea markets , so I decided to come to the flea market to buy a bargain .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's wise to do it . The Americans have the habit of selling their junk when they are moving to another place , so they usually display all the things they want to sell in their gardens at the weekend . And many things they are selling still look quite new and they are also very useful .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have heard about it while in China . it is called a " yard sale " . I didn't have any idea of that until today when I came here to the big " yard sale " .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You must have got many useful things for your new apartment .
segments.speaker: S2
